capstone.title: Convert Master - Capstone Project
capstone.bio: Convert Master is an advanced mobile application designed to simplify currency and unit conversions into Canadian values. This project aims to enhance user experience by providing real-time exchange rates, seamless unit conversions, and a user-friendly interface. Developed as part of the Capstone Project at George Brown College, Convert Master integrates modern development tools and APIs to ensure accuracy and efficiency.

expanded_view.project_vision: The vision of Convert Master is to create a reliable and intuitive mobile application that assists users in converting foreign currency and measurement units into their Canadian equivalents. By integrating real-time exchange rate data and automated conversion algorithms, the project aims to eliminate manual calculations and provide instant results.
system_architecture: API calls through Retrofit for currency exchange rates

progress_reports: Conversion page updated with dropdowns for currency and unit selection
pending_tasks: Improve UI/UX for better user experience

deployment_plan: Conduct final testing on Android devices
Implement security measures for user data
Submit to Google Play Store for release
testing_strategy: Unit testing for currency and unit conversions
API testing for real-time exchange rates
